question: What is the name of the explosive detection device which was launched in the National Workshop on Explosive Detection 2020?
explanation: The National Workshop on Explosive Detection (NWED-2020) was organized in Pune, Maharashtra. During the event, an explosive detection device named RaIDer-X was launched. It is capable of detect explosives from a stand-off distance. The device is developed by HEMRL, Pune and IISc, Bangalore.
